import React, { Component } from "react"; import Header from "./common/Header"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import Footer from "./common/Footer"; import ScriptTag from "react-script-tag"; import AOS from "aos"; import QRCode from "qrcode.react"; import axios from "axios"; import swal from "sweetalert"; import CardIcon from "./assets/images/gold-card-image.png"; import Avatar from "./assets/img/default-user-avatar.png"; let scan_id_raw = window.location.href.split("/")[ window.location.href.split("/").length - 1 ]; let scan_id = localStorage["scanState"] ? JSON.parse(localStorage["scanState"]).refURL : ""; // console.log(scan_id); // save scan_id state in local storage let scanState = { refURL: scan_id_raw, }; localStorage["scanState"] = JSON.stringify(scanState); export class Scan extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { // token: localStorage["appState"] // ? JSON.parse(localStorage["appState"]).user.token // : "", user: [], }; AOS.init(); } componentDidMount() { axios .get(`${axios.defaults.baseURL}/verify-user/${scan_id}`, { // headers: { // Authorization: `Bearer ${this.state.token}`, // }, }) .then((response) => { //console.log(response); return response; }) .then((json) => { if (json.data.success) { this.setState({ user: json.data.user[0], }); // } else alert("Cannot Fetch Data!"); } else { swal("Not Found!", "Member does not Exist!", "error"); this.props.history.push("/"); } }) .catch((error) => { console.error(`An Error Occured! ${error}`); }); // alert(id) } render() { return (
